title: piccaikku vandIrO
sahitya:
piccaikku vandIrO kapAlI nIrEn tAn


anupallavi

  lajjaiyai viTTu sarva jaganmOhana sundara
 enda vESam pOTTAlum porundum enru kATTa


caraNam 1    shailaputri paTTADai naghai naTTu kETTALO shAntamillAmal talaiyODEndi- mOdhakam vayiTrukkup-pOdAmal sandhi marattaDigaLilgundum
magan pAshamO engaL mayilai vIdhiyai shuTri
  caraNam 2  koLLaik-kUTTattiR kanci aSt-aisvaryangaLaiyum kubEraniDam koDuttu
 oLittu vaittu viTTu veLLai veLukka shAmbal aLLip-pUshina mEni
ellAm pAmbu neLiya guDuguDup-pANDi pOlap-
